bmcEntity.exMgsThrownPastSec: In 10 minutes, MDS Equity application threw 20 exceptions. Please investigate during working hours.

exceptionCounter.bmcExMsg: MDS Equity application encounter invalid request exception. Usually because the caller's request does not conform to the JSON format. Please investigate with caller during working hours.

Header FunctionId don't match the rules or can't be empty.

MDS Equity application encounter authentication decryption failed exception. Please check the log immediately to analyze the root reason.
MDS Equity application encounter database unknown error. Please check the log immediately to analyze the root reason.

MDS Equity application encounter illegal configuration exception. Usually because configuration is invalid. We don't except this error in a production environment, so please check the log immediately to analyze the root reason.

MDS Equity application encounter application illegal configuration exception. Usually because application configuration is invalid. We don't except this error in a production environment, so please check the log immediately to analyze the root reason.

MDS Equity application encounter PredSrch illegal configuration exception. Usually because PredSrch configuration is invalid. We don't except this error in a production environment, so please check the log immediately to analyze the root reason.

MDS Equity application encounter illegal initialization exception. This exception usually occurs when the project is launched. If this exception occurs during runtime, please check the log immediately to analyze the root reason.

MDS Equity application encounter authentication illegal initialization exception. This exception usually occurs when the project is launched. If this exception occurs during runtime, please check the log immediately to analyze the root reason.

MDS Equity application encounter DB relation exception. This exception usually occurs when the project is launched. If this exception occurs during runtime, please check the log immediately to analyze the root reason.

MDS Equity application can't retrieve data from vendor. Usually because the remote service is not available. Please check the log immediately to analyze the root reason, then report to related vendor.

MDS Equity application can't retrieve data from PredSrch vendor. Usually because the PredSrch service is not available. Please check the log immediately to analyze the root reason, then report to PredSrch vendor.

MDS Equity application encounter invalid response exception. Usually because the returned data does not meet our expectations. The reason for this exception should be request parameters are incorrect or remote service is not available. Please check the log immediately to analyze the root reason, then report to caller or relared vendor.

MDS Equity application encounter invalid PredSrch response exception. Usually because PredSrch service is not available or requested products are not supported. Please check the log immediately to analyze the root reason, then report to PredSrch vendor or caller.

MDS Equity application encounter empty content PredSrch response. Usually because client input invalid symbols. Please check the log to analyze the root reason, then report to PredSrch vendor or caller.
